entry.title: Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Pouch - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Embrace Your Punch

Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Flavours 

Enjoy Sour Punches iconic straws in mini form! 3 flavors of sour candy per bag: Blue Raspberry, Green Apple & Strawberry.

These soft & chewy candy bites are covered in the classic sour sugar coating and come in small bite-sized pieces. What is awesome about this candy is that it comes in a resealable bag! It will perfectly fit in your backpack or purse for a on-the-go snack. You can even try pairing these sour fruity candies with a snack like popcorn!

  • Low Fat
  • Low Sodium
  • Kosher & Halal Certified

3.5oz

entry.title: Kervan Assorted Dinosaurs Gummy Candy - 5lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kervan USA
Type: Bulk
Price: 24.99

Kervan Gourmet Gummy Candy

Kervan Dinosaurs Gummy Candies are one of the world's sweetest candy creatures and are made with the finest ingredients. These Dinosaur shaped candies may ROAR! but they don't bite! The only one doing any biting around here is you, as you enjoy their yummy fruity flavours. The assorted fruit flavours come in the colours of cherry red, lime green, blue raspberry blue, and lemon yellow.

Kervan Assorted Dinosaur Bulk Candy is a sweet addition to any Candy Buffet or Corporate Event.

  • Halal Candy
  • Made in Turkey
  • Made with the finest ingredients

5 lbs Bulk Candy 

Ingredients: 
Corn Syrup, Sugar, Beef Gelatine, Citric Acid, Palm Oil, Artificial Flavors, Carnauba Wax, Artificial Colors [Yellow #5 (E102), Blue #1 (E133), Red #40 (E129)] Produced in a facility that also processes gluten, soy lecithin, tree nuts, milk and products of milk.

Enjoy a Sweet on the Lighter Side

    These creamy hard candies are delightful and guilt-free! Kerr's Light candies sweetened with Splenda pack only 7 calories apiece, so you never have to feel bad about enjoying one of these tasty sweets! 

     This bag comes with the scrumptious flavours of Chai Latte and Green Tea Latte, it'll be as if you were slowly sipping on the beverages themselves! Perfect as a gift for anyone who loves a good frothy latte on the go without any of the hassles.

entry.title: Britain Sweets Chocolate Caramel Toffee - 120g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheery Chews
Type: Candy
Price: 4.99

Sweet Caramel Toffee Coated in Mouthwatering Chocolate

Established in 1982, Britain Sweets combined their love and admiration of sweets with their appreciation for the iconic views of London, England. Building from the ground up these tasty treats are a combination of their joyful experiences and precious memories all in bite-sized treats. Made in the UK.

Chewy, smooth caramel toffee wrapped up in a rich milk chocolate coating. Try Britain Sweets Chocolate Caramel Toffees for a mix of chocolate and toffee that'll satisfy any sweet tooth. These toffee treats pair perfectly with an afternoon coffee. Made with 100% Non-GMO ingredients and halal-certified, they are 100% yummy. 

  • Natural Flavours
  • Non-GMO
  • Peanut-Free
  • Sesame-Free 
  • Milk-Free
  • Halal-certified
  • Suitable for Vegetarians and Celiacs

     120 g
